thread.title: Giuliani: Hillary Clinton 'got away with murder' at debate
thread.title_full: Giuliani: Hillary Clinton 'got away with murder' at debate - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Giuliani: Hillary Clinton 'got away with murder' at debate
text:
David Wexler/David Wexler For New York Daily Former Mayor Rudy Guiliani said that if he had the opportunity to question Hillary Clinton about her emails, “it would have been a lot different." Former New York Mayor Rudy Giuliani said Sunday that Hillary Clinton "got away with murder" at last week's inaugural Democratic debate on CNN.
"Bernie Sanders virtually applauded Hillary for destroying her emails," Giuliani told John Catsimatidis on "The Cats Roundtable" on AM970 in New York.
"I have a list of 13 criminal statutes that Hillary allegedly violated with her conduct," he added about the controversy surrounding Clinton's use of a private email server during her tenure as secretary of state. "If you had let me question her, it would have been a lot different."
"She got away with murder," he added. "And the rest of them got away with murder."
"This was like a love-fest," Giuliani said.
At last Tuesday's debate, Sanders helped deflect persistent questions about Clinton's email server by saying, in a memorable line, "the American people are sick and tired of hearing about your damn emails."
Giuliani also sized up the Republican field during his interview Sunday, praising Donald Trump by telling GOP voters that they should "not take him lightly."
"From the very beginning I have said, 'Do not take him lightly,'" he said. "He is one of the three that I would have to put (as having a) chance of being the next President."
"I would still put Bush there," Giuliani said of the former Florida governor. "I have a high regard for him."
"And I'm beginning to see kind of a surge for (Florida Sen. Marco) Rubio," he added. "I wouldn't be so uncomfortable with Ben Carson in the White House.”
Related Stories Hillary Clinton, Bernie Sanders dominate Democratic debate Sanders’ #damnemails comment at debate wins social media Hillary Clinton, Bernie Sanders have a ‘Kumbaya moment’
